lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Producers intend to present a single candidate for the post, and this is most likely to be Edouard Kouame from Ivory Coast, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bra Kanon completed bilateral consultations with several delegations today on the main sticking points in the draft buffer stock rules package, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Certain delegations wanted further discussion on the amount of non-member cocoa the buffer stock will be permitted to buy, differentials for different origin cocoas and limits on buffer stock purchases of nearby, and forward material, the delegates said.
